meanings.definition: A technique of inlaying sections of wood to form a design.
meanings.sent1: The artist used intarsia to create a beautiful wooden mosaic.
meanings.sent2: The intarsia on the cabinet added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The intarsia design on the table looked like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Her intarsia work transformed the plain wood into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The intricate intarsia pattern seemed to come alive with each piece perfectly placed.

meanings.definition: A type of knitting that creates a pattern using different colored yarns.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to do intarsia knitting to make colorful designs on her sweaters.
meanings.sent2: The intarsia technique allowed her to knit pictures of animals on her scarf.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at intarsia knitting resulted in a sweater that looked like a rainbow gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: The intarsia knitting on the blanket made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The intricate intarsia design on the hat caught everyone's attention with its vibrant colors.
